verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: The talks] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: took] [ARG2: place] [ARGM-TMP: as Qatari officials looked to seek friendly relations in the U.S. after President Trump backed a blockade of the] country.</p >
